headline: Align Technology (ALGN) Stock Trades Up, Here Is Why
summary: Shares of dental technology company Align Technology (NASDAQ:ALGN) jumped 3% in the morning session after its President and CEO, Joe Hogan, personally purchased approximately $1 million of the company's common stock. Mr. Hogan stated that the purchase reflected his continuing confidence in the long-term value of Align. This insider buying often acted as a bullish signal to investors, suggesting that leadership believed the company's shares held significant upside. The transaction added to the ap

headline: Align Technology: Moving From Sell To Neutral
summary: Align Technology shares plunged last after Q2 results were posted. Click here to find out why ALGN stock is a Hold.
